text: Green Chains () is a 1970 Soviet adventure movie directed by Grigori Aronov.Сеть «Москино» бесплатно покажет фильмы о Великой Отечественной войнеЗЕЛЕНЫЕ ЦЕПОЧКИ It stars Aleksandr Grigoryev, Igor Urumbekov, and Vladimir Leletko. == Actors == * Aleksandr Grigoryev as Mishka Alakseyev * Igor Urumbekov as Vaska Kozhukh * Vladimir Leletko as Styopka Panfilov * Pavel Luspekayev as Ivan Vasilyevich * Oleg Belov as Alesey Burakov * Aleksey Mikhaylov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1970 movies Category:Soviet adventure movies
title: Green Chains
